meanings.definition: A person whose life is devoted to the pursuit and enjoyment of luxury and sensual pleasure.
meanings.sent1: The wealthy voluptuary spent his days surrounded by opulence and indulgence.
meanings.sent2: She was known in the city as a notorious voluptuary, always seeking the finest things in life.
meanings.sent3: The party was a gathering of voluptuaries, each trying to outdo the other in extravagance.
meanings.sent4: In the world of fashion, she was considered a voluptuary, always draped in the most luxurious fabrics.
meanings.sent5: The palace was a haven for voluptuaries, with every room designed for maximum comfort and pleasure.

meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or characterized by luxury and sensual pleasure.
meanings.sent1: The hotel suite was decorated in a voluptuary style, with plush furnishings and soft lighting.
meanings.sent2: The painting captured the essence of a voluptuary lifestyle, with lavish feasts and elegant attire.
meanings.sent3: The garden party had a voluptuary atmosphere, with guests lounging on silk cushions under the stars.
meanings.sent4: The music had a voluptuary quality, filling the room with rich, velvety tones.
meanings.sent5: The scent of the flowers was voluptuary, enveloping the senses in a heady, intoxicating perfume.
